AIAppConfigurationProtocol Protocol Reference

Conforms to NSObject
Declared in AIAppConfigurationProtocol.h

Overview

protocol for defining app configuration methods

– getPropertyForKey:group:error: required method

Gets property for key

- (id)getPropertyForKey:(NSString *)key group:(NSString *)group error:(NSError **)error

Parameters

key

the key
group

the group name
error

the configError as OUT parameter; errorCode is null in case of success, or contains error value on failure @throws IllegalArgumentException if group or key are null, empty string, or contain other characters than [a-zA-Z0-9_.-]

Return Value

the value for key mapped by name, or null if no such mapping exists

Availability

1.0.0

Discussion

Note: if value is literal then ‘String’ Object is returned if value is number then ‘Integer’ Object is returned if value is array of literal then ‘array of String’ Object is returned if value is array of number then ‘array of Integer’ Object is returned

Declared In

AIAppConfigurationProtocol.h

– setPropertyForKey:group:value:error: required method

Sets property for key

- (BOOL)setPropertyForKey:(NSString *)key group:(NSString *)group value:(id)value error:(NSError **)error

Parameters

key

the key
group

the group name
value

new value that needs to be set for the key. Value can be String, Number, Array of Strings, Array of Numbers and Dictionary
error

the configError as OUT parameter; errorCode is null in case of success, or contains error value on failure @throws IllegalArgumentException if group or key or value are null, empty string, or contain other characters than [a-zA-Z0-9_.-]

Return Value

Bool indicating whether value is set correctly

Availability

1.0.0

Declared In

AIAppConfigurationProtocol.h

– getDefaultPropertyForKey:group:error: required method

Gets property for key from the static file

- (id)getDefaultPropertyForKey:(NSString *)key group:(NSString *)group error:(NSError **)error

Parameters

key

the key
group

the group name
error

the configError as OUT parameter; errorCode is null in case of success, or contains error value on failure @throws IllegalArgumentException if group or key are null, empty string, or contain other characters than [a-zA-Z0-9_.-]

Return Value

the value for key mapped by name, or null if no such mapping exists

Availability

1.0.0

Discussion

Note: if value is literal then ‘String’ Object is returned if value is number then ‘Integer’ Object is returned if value is array of literal then ‘array of String’ Object is returned if value is array of number then ‘array of Integer’ Object is returned

Declared In

AIAppConfigurationProtocol.h

– refreshCloudConfig: required method

Refresh cloud config. It will be downloaded if the URL of the config in Service Discovery has changed compared to last time the config was downloaded

- (void)refreshCloudConfig:(void ( ^ ) ( AIACRefreshResult refreshResult , NSError *error ))completionHandler

Parameters

completionHandler

asynchronous callback reporting result of refresh. This block has no return value and takes two arguments:refreshResult and error completionHandler will be called on main thread.

Availability

2.1.0

Declared In

AIAppConfigurationProtocol.h

– resetConfig: required method

used to reset the dynamic config as well as cloud config

- (BOOL)resetConfig:(NSError **)error

Parameters

error

error description

Return Value

returns bool status

Availability

2.2.0

Declared In

AIAppConfigurationProtocol.h
